        public boolean sendMessage(boolean fin,
                  int opcode,
                  int[] mask,
                  byte[] message)
        Sends a message to the client.
        Parameters:
        fin - True if this is a complete message
        opcode - One of Connection.OPCODE_*
        mask - The mask that has been applied to the message
        message - The message to send
        Returns:
        True if no IOException was thrown
